org.mt4j.util
Class SwingTextureRenderer

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.util.SwingTextureRenderer

public class SwingTextureRenderer
extends java.lang.Object

This class can be used to render java swing JComponents to an OpenGL texture. So this can at the moment only be used in OpenGL.
After instantiating this class the component will be rendered by a call to scheduleRefresh(). The OpenGL texture can then be retrieved by the getTextureToRenderTo() method.

Note: Order of adding components is the order in which they appear in z-order -> add ontop comps first

Note: The JComponents can only be displayed if setBounds or setSize is called with positive values (probably only neccessary when using no layoutManager).

Author:
Christopher Ruff

scheduleRefresh

public void scheduleRefresh()
This schedules a new pass of rendering the JComponent into a texture. Use this to render the component into the texture or to update the texture if the JComponent changed.
